The Michigan secretary of state: s website showed that Joe Biden had fewer votes than Donald Trump at the time the claim was made.
The screenshot of the secretary of state: s website, which was shared on social media, was verified to be authentic.
The Associated Press: AP), known for its high accuracy in calling election races, declared Joe Biden the winner in Michigan based on an analysis of the votes counted and the number of remaining ballots.
The AP: s decision to call the race for Biden was based on data that was not yet posted on the secretary of state's website, highlighting the importance of checking county websites for up-to-date information.
